'''Winding River''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 29]].

==Trivia==
* <section begin="BishuiTheme" /> The soundtracks ''Winding River'', ''Rhythm Amidst the Reeds'', ''Flows of Jade-Like Water'', ''Stroll in the Shadows'', ''Melodious Flute'', ''Vague Whispers'', ''Legends Swept Away'', and ''Lingering Bitterness'' all share the same theme and are commonly associated with the Bishui Plain area. This shared theme was also notably featured in the Character Demo soundtrack ''Qilin's Prance''.<section end="BishuiTheme" />
* ''Winding River'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Zhongli]] for this song.
